category.name: Integration.TCAA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: TCAAE121_save_drawing_under_projectitem
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to have TCAA set AutoCAD Electrical drawings to be stored by default under the same item revision of the owning project. Possible values: 0 - drawings are set to be stored under separate item revisions 1 - drawings are set to be stored under the same item revision of the owning project (Default)
